alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 14 at 5:44PM MDT until March 15 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MDT WEDNESDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... Strong winds this afternoon have temporarily diminished this evening. However, winds are expected to increase again late tonight through early Wednesday morning. Therefore, a High Wind Watch remains in effect.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph, or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
